alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:39AM CDT until April 01 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 139 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Calhoun City, or 22 miles east of Grenada, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Calhoun City and Derma around 145 AM CDT. Vardaman and Pyland around 155 AM CDT. Houston around 205 AM CDT. Trebloc around 210 AM CDT. Okolona around 220 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sparta, Bounds, Thorn, Van Vleet, Parkersburg, Egypt, Loyd, Woodland, Thelma and Tabbville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
